Libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(Seurat)
library(tidyr)
library(SeuratObject)
#remotes::install_github("mojaveazure/seurat-disk")
library(SeuratDisk)
```

Read in data for individual studies
```{r}
ddir <- "~/Dropbox/CSI/Datasets/Gerhard_JEM"

files <- list.files(path=ddir, pattern = "\\.h5ad$", full.names = T)
f <- files[1]

Convert(f, dest = "h5seurat", overwrite = TRUE)
f.seu <- LoadH5Seurat(file=sprintf(f,"%s.h5seurat"))

```
